meanings.definition: Very small or insignificant in size or importance.
meanings.sent1: The dinkiest puppy in the litter was so tiny it could fit in a teacup.
meanings.sent2: She picked the dinkiest flower from the garden to put in her hair.
meanings.sent3: The dinkiest ant tried to carry a crumb bigger than itself.
meanings.sent4: In the vast forest, the dinkiest squirrel ruled over all the creatures.
meanings.sent5: The dinkiest star in the sky twinkled faintly.

meanings.definition: Of the smallest or least impressive kind.
meanings.sent1: The dinkiest car on the lot was barely bigger than a toy.
meanings.sent2: He found the dinkiest seashell on the beach and kept it as a souvenir.
meanings.sent3: The dinkiest cupcake at the party had the most elaborate decoration.
meanings.sent4: Her dinkiest necklace held the most sentimental value.
meanings.sent5: The dinkiest house on the street had the prettiest garden.
